Download essential UKB resources as a SQLite database file

Source: R/utils.R
get_ukb_db.Rd

Downloads a file called ukb.db from the ukbwranglr_resources repo to the specified directory. This is an SQLite database containing the UKB data dictionary and codings files, UKB resource 592 (lookup tables and code mappings for various clinical coding systems) and clinical code lists from the CALIBER repo.

get_ukb_db(directory_path)

Arguments

directory_path

character. The directory where ukb.db will be downloaded to.

Value

Returns path to ukb.db as a string invisibly

Contents
